title: Sheet music: Vocal works by Jean Sibelius
description:
Sheet music, classical music, music for choir and solo voice, with or without piano acc. In PDF, sorted after genre and name of piece.

This is my collection of Jean Sibelius' works for choir and solo voice as of October 21st 2008.

The represented works are listed beneath under their original name, which in most cases means Swedish (Sibelius was part of the Swedish speaking minority of Finland, as am I), and their opus number. The abbreviation "u. op." means "without an opus number". Some pieces have been assigned various opus numbers over the years due to the fact that Sibelius often reused and rewrote his works. "Incomplete" means that I don't have the full set of songs included in the opus.
